description: This file defines an Angular standalone component for resetting a user's password, including form handling, validation, and interaction with authentication and routing services.

classes.name: ResetPasswordComponent
classes.description: Angular component allowing users to reset their password via a form, handling validation, submitting data to the auth service, and providing user feedback.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component, retrieving the reset token from query parameters.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission, validates password matching, calls the reset password service, and navigates on success.
